DOC.detailed_description: The study objectives assess safety clinical performance CoreValve™ Evolut R™ System patient severe symptomatic aortic stenosis consider high extreme risk surgical aortic valve replacement . These objective accomplish prospective clinical study involve 60 implanted subject among six study center .
